title: We Try The Mustard Watermelon TikTok Trend + Raymundo Offers Debt Tips + A Listener's Unbelievable Lottery Story!
itunes:title: We Try The Mustard Watermelon TikTok Trend + Raymundo Offers Debt Tips + A Listener's Unbelievable Lottery Story!
description:
We put all of the show members on the wheel and whoever loses has to eat Watermelon with Mustard on it based on the viral TikTok trend. Raymundo tells us how he improved his credit score. Caller Adam tells us a crazy story about how won BIG on a $5 dollar scratch from his birthday.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
